title: Peru
description: In December 2008 my family went on a National Geographic Expedition that led you on a week of hiking to Machu Picchu.

photos.description: A bird. I'm not that excited about birds specifically, but I like animal photography and they just tend to be what you see the most of.
Salkantay. I like the framing with the valley.
I think Salktantay again from the other side, but maybe it's some other mountain.
A spectacled bear eating watermelon/staring pensively. I think this was some sort of nature preserve. There's a fence in the extreme foreground, but I mostly managed to hide it in this shot.
Machu Picchu from the spot where everyone photographs it.
